name: Bengali-English Lottery Scam
description: Bengali+English lottery scam where scammer claims victim won Jio Lucky Draw and extracts processing fee via bank transfer.

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! Apnar mobile number Jio Lucky Draw te Rs 15,00,000 jiteche! Ref: JIO-BNG-2026. Prize claim korte amader office e contact korun.
turns.notes: Initial Bengali-English lottery hook with fake reference number.

turns.scammer_message: Apni amader number +91-9900334455 te call korun. Processing fee Rs 2,000 lagbe.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phone number and introduces processing fee.

turns.scammer_message: Fee ta bank account 6677889900112244 te transfer korun. Amra ICICI Bank use kori.
turns.notes: Scammer provides bank account number for fee transfer.

turns.scammer_message: Apni ki transfer korchen? Jodi kono problem hoy, +91-9900334455 te call korun. Account number 6677889900112244 te Rs 2,000 pathiye din.
turns.notes: Scammer follows up repeating both phone number and bank account.

turns.scammer_message: Aaj last date prize claim korar. Tara tari 6677889900112244 te fee transfer korun. Na korle Rs 15,00,000 prize forfeit hoye jabe. Amader helpline +91-9900334455.
turns.notes: Final urgency with deadline, both extraction targets repeated.
